start_message:
Hello. I'm a bot for downloading media files.
Please send a link to a YouTube video.
no_admin_access: Sorry, you don't have access to the admin panel.
no_access: Sorry, you don't have access to this bot.
no_access_chanel: To use the bot, you need to be subscribed to the channel: {channel}
enter_new_key_username: Enter a username for the new key:
no_key_creation_access: Sorry, you don't have access to create keys.
enter_key_delete_username: Enter the username whose key needs to be deleted:
no_key_deletion_access: Sorry, you don't have access to delete keys.
source_detected:
Service detected: {source}.
Choose a format to save:
unknown_source:
Sorry, I can't determine the source from this link.
Please make sure you've sent a correct link.
processing_request:
Download task created.
Waiting for completion...
video_info_error:
An error occurred while getting video information.
Please try again.
key_missing:
Unfortunately, your key was not found on the server.
I'll create a new key for you.
key_created_successfully: Key created successfully. User: {username} New key: {key} Permissions: {permissions}
key_deletion_error: Failed to delete key on the server. Error: {error}
processing_error: An error occurred while processing the request: {error}
download_complete_audio_url: Your YouTube audio is ready! {title} Here's your file link: {file_url}
download_complete_audio: Your YouTube audio is ready! {title}
more_requests: If you have more requests, please send a new link.
